nodes.bodyText: Isn't the default supposed to be "keep"?
Might be a bit cleaner with a KeepInvPolicy enum rather than just strings?
Not sure if there's much point to that, since otherwise it's just trying to parse strings to enums.
@pop4959 I'd prefer an enum to magic values being used to determine behaviour, even if those magic values are strings.
Nothing really wrong with it, just adds an extra layer of code. Doesn't have any impact on the user, since they're still typing in the same strings.
